string.name: n0
string.value: Open your item inventory and you'll find equip., use, set-up, and etc. tabs.

string.name: n1
string.value: The item you pick up is automatically stored in an appropriate item category. What do you think? Isn't it cool?

string.name: n2
string.value: Double-click on an item in the item inventory and you'll be able to use it

string.name: f0
string.value: You want to discard an item? Then click on an item in the inventory, and drag it out of the window.

string.name: f1
string.value: If your item inventory is full, you won't be able to take in new items. You should take care of the unimportant ones by either discarding them or selling them at a store.

string.name: f2
string.value: Use items can also be stored on the bottom right trey where you can assign HotKey's...

string.name: w0
string.value: You'll die once your HP reaches 0, so it's for your own good to take a potion or food before it's too late.

string.name: w1
string.value: You want to go travel now? Then come talk to me...

string.name: w2
string.value: If you want to talk to someone, double-click on them

string.name: n0
string.value: I'm... so ... hungry!

string.name: n1
string.value: Can... I... eat this ...?

string.name: n0
string.value: You should train yourself well before going on the journey.

string.name: n1
string.value: Well done getting here!

string.name: n2
string.value: This is the exit to the Mushroom Town.

string.name: f0
string.value: If you want to move on to the next stage, talk to me.

string.name: f1
string.value: Be careful...once you leave this place, you'll see monsters roaming around.

string.name: w0
string.value: So you're ready for the adventure?

string.name: w1
string.value: Now it's all up to you to train yourself. Good luck!

string.name: w2
string.value: We instructors are all related. Roger, my older brother, and Robin, my younger brother, all work together here.

string.name: h1
string.value: So what's my relationship with Roger? Hahaha...he's my older brother!

string.name: n0
string.value: Be careful! You'll see monsters around here.

string.name: n1
string.value: Press the left Ctrl key to attack the monster.

string.name: n2
string.value: Press Z and you'll be able to pick up the item the monster drops.

string.name: n3
string.value: If it's a powerful monster, how about teaming up with someone else?

string.name: f0
string.value: You need to time the attack right to take down the monsters easily.

string.name: f1
string.value: The town you just saw is called Mushroom Town. You'll also find places called Southperry and Amherst on this island.

string.name: f2
string.value: If you want to head over to a bigger, wider area, try heading up northeast.

string.name: w0
string.value: You met up with my brothers Roger and Peter before, right?

string.name: w1
string.value: Best of luck to you!

string.name: n0
string.value: It's a neverending pile of laundry I'm hanging up here.

string.name: n1
string.value: Have you met up with my sister Heena before?

string.name: n2
string.value: Pressâ†‘ and you'll be able to climb up the ladder or a rope.

string.name: n3
string.value: Double-click on us, and you'll be able to talk to us.

string.name: a0
string.value: Why isn't Heena helping me hang this load of laundry up?

string.name: s0
string.value: You must be on a journey for the first time, huh?

string.name: i0
string.value: What should I make for dinner...?

string.name: l0
string.value: Oh my gosh, I still have a lot of laundry to take care of...

string.name: h0
string.value: Haven't washed my hair in days...and...

string.name: n0
string.value: Beautiful day today!

string.name: n2
string.value: Press the arrow keys to move around here and there.

string.name: s2
string.value: How's the traveling?

string.name: b0
string.value: Whoa...you look awkward there.

string.name: c0
string.value: Arrghh, my beautiful skin...

string.name: n0
string.value: What would be good for dinner?

string.name: s0
string.value: I'm cute, right?

string.name: n0
string.value: Ahh...I need to get this letter sent...

string.name: a0
string.value: Why isn't anyone passing by!!

string.name: l0
string.value: Whoa, time's going fast...it may be too late...

string.name: h0
string.value: Ahh...what should I do...

string.name: n0
string.value: Do you need my help by any chance? I can handle machinery really well...

string.name: n1
string.value: I just ate a little bit ago...and yet I'm hungry already...!!

string.name: n2
string.value: Phew...work is hard. I need to take a break.

string.value: On sale! Really CHEAP!

string.name: n1
string.value: Welcome!! Hahahaha!

string.name: n0
string.value: Ok, cheap goods! Really cheap!!

string.name: n1
string.value: Hey you!! Don't even think about stealing in here...

string.name: n2
string.value: You definitely need potions to travel

string.name: n0
string.value: Stranger...what are you doing here?

string.name: n1
string.value: I'm not too fond of the strangers. I'm only worried about the peace of this town.

string.name: n2
string.value: You...if you're strong and powerful, can you take care of the monsters around town?

string.name: n0
string.value: Do you know me by any chance? You don't? What's wrong with you?

string.name: n1
string.value: If you are thinking of challenging me, I suggest you keep dreaming...

string.name: n2
string.value: Is there anyone that can satisfy my desire to fight...?

string.name: n0
string.value: Isn't it nice out here today?

string.value: I used to be an adventurer myself...but now I don't mind living a normal life...

string.name: n2
string.value: You don't need to be that scared of it. I've walked away from that lifestyle long ago.

string.name: n0
string.value: Working hard there~

string.name: n0
string.value: Hmm...looks like I'm still the best looking man in this town.

string.name: n1
string.value: Hey you! What are you looking at! If you're admiring at my good looks, might as well say it!!

string.name: n2
string.value: One of these days, I'll be the one operating that huge ship, and take off to a far bigger land...

string.name: n0
string.value: Whoa, what are you looking at?!?!

string.value: Let's see...I'm ready to make some money...

string.name: n1

string.name: n1
string.value: Come check it out!! Hahahahah!

string.value: Here you go! Delicious food fresh and homemade!

string.name: n1
string.value: On a hot day like this, Ice with Red-Beans is the way to go!

string.name: n0
string.value: This is Florina Beach!

string.name: n1
string.value: If you want to head back to Lith Harbor, feel free to talk to me.

string.name: n0
string.value: Welcome to Florina Beach~!

string.name: n1
string.value: Aren't we hot?

string.name: n0
string.value: Welcome to Florina Beach~!

string.name: n1
string.value: Aren't we hot?

string.name: n0
string.value: Welcome to Florina Beach~!

string.name: n1
string.value: Aren't we hot?

string.name: n0
string.value: There's a huge tree in this town...

string.name: n1
string.value: Do you want to know how to decorate the tree?

string.name: name
string.value: Branch Snowman

string.name: n0
string.value: You'll enter the room with trees through me.

string.name: n1
string.value: Please hurry...there aren't many rooms with trees left!

string.value: Metal Bucket Snowman

string.name: n0
string.value: You'll enter the room with trees through me.

string.name: n1
string.value: Please hurry...there aren't many rooms with trees left!

string.value: Strawhat Snowman

string.name: n0
string.value: You'll enter the room with trees through me.

string.name: n1
string.value: Please hurry...there aren't many rooms with trees left!

string.name: name
string.value: Scarf Snowman

string.name: n0
string.value: Come talk to me if you want to head out.

string.name: n1
string.value: Everyone decorate your trees!

string.name: n0
string.value: Do you want to make the 3rd job advancement? If so, then talk to me...

string.name: n1
string.value: To those that want a 3rd job advancement, here...

string.name: n0
string.value: Come talk to me if you want to head back to Ellinia of Victoria Island.

string.name: n0
string.value: Looking for ornaments? Look no further!!

string.name: n1
string.value: My ornaments are the best~!

string.name: n0
string.value: My horn ... where .. is .. my horn!!!

string.name: n1
string.value: Please, someone find my horn!!

string.name: name
string.value: Staff Sergeant Charlie

string.name: n0
string.value: Oh no...I need to get things on board and take off...

string.name: n1
string.value: Are you interested, by any chance, in trading items with me?

string.name: name
string.value: Mino the Owner

string.name: n0
string.value: Welcome. Oh no...your hair's been through tough times, huh? It needs some treatment...

string.name: n1
string.value: Would you like to have a soft, silky-smooth, beautiful hair? Then let me take care of you...

string.name: s0
string.value: Oh...you aren't interested in me, by any chance, right?

string.name: s1
string.value: It's a fact that you don't have much time to take care of your hair while on the journey

string.name: l0
string.value: The only way you can keep your hair in perfect condition is through continuous effort!

string.name: l1
string.value: To keep your hair as beautiful as mine requires major, maaajor effort.

string.name: name
string.value: Franz the Owner

string.name: n0
string.value: Do you want a plastic surgery? Let me help you out then...

string.name: n1
string.value: There's nothing wrong with changing your face every once in a while...

string.name: n0
string.value: How about making a glove? I can take care of the rest...

string.name: n1
string.value: You'll need a nice glove to handle your weapon better...how about making one here?

string.name: name
string.value: Corporal Wilson

string.name: n0
string.value: I'm here selling food for pets!

string.name: n1
string.value: Don't you need some food for your pet?

string.name: name
string.value: Ticketing Usher

string.name: n0
string.value: You need to purchase the ticket to get on the ride to Victoria Island

string.name: n1
string.value: Please purchase ticket from me and get on the board.

string.name: name
string.value: Ticketing Usher

string.name: n0
string.value: If you want to get on the ride to Victoria, please give me the ticket for it.

string.name: n1
string.value: There's a limited capacity for this ship, so please get on right now...it'll be leaving shortly.

string.name: n2
string.value: Please be careful of the fact that, if you enter the cash shop and leave while on the ship during the ride, then you'll find yourself returned to Orbis.

string.name: name
string.value: Crewmember Erin

string.name: n0
string.value: Anything I can do to help? Hope you enjoy the trip.

string.name: n1
string.value: If you want to leave the ship and go back to the place of takeoff, please come talk to me

string.name: n2
string.value: Please be careful of the fact that, if you enter the cash shop and leave while on the ship during the ride, then you'll find yourself returned to Orbis.

string.name: name
string.value: Neri the Fairy

string.name: n0
string.value: You'll need a great weapon or two to survive here in Ossyria...

string.name: n1
string.value: You can't fool these set of fairy eyes, so I suggest you don't think of stealing around here.

string.name: c0
string.value: To make great weapons, I need great materials to start with...

string.name: c1
string.value: It's been 150 years since I last saw Rowen from Ellinia...I wonder how he's doing...

string.name: name
string.value: Nuri the Fairy

string.name: n0
string.value: You may want to grab an armor before heading out of town...

string.name: n1
string.value: I have many goods that are perfect for humans, so come check them out.

string.name: c0
string.value: Monsters seem to be more ferocious these days...armors are definitely a must for each and every one of you travelers

string.name: c1
string.value: How's Victoria Island these days?

string.name: name
string.value: Edel the Fairy

string.name: n0
string.value: There's no telling when and where you may face a powerful monster! Potions are definitely a must for every traveler!

string.name: n1
string.value: I also have various tasty dishes made by the fairies ourselves.

string.name: c0
string.value: To make a good potion like this, I need to go around from place to place everyday looking for only the finest ingredients available.

string.name: c1
string.value: I'm sure the fairies at Ellinia are doing well...right?

string.name: name
string.value: Platform Usher

string.name: n0
string.value: Orbis Station is huge. I'll take you to the station platform, so talk to me.

string.name: n1
string.value: The platform is different according to the final destination. Go through me to use the platforms!

string.name: name
string.value: Rinz the Assistant

string.name: n0
string.value: Hello~! Thanks for visiting our hair salon!

string.name: n1
string.value: I may not be as good as the owner, but...how about letting me take care of your hair still?

string.name: s0
string.value: Do you want to know about the latest trends in hairstyle? I'll do it for you!

string.name: s1
string.value: Fairies love beautiful things, so I'm thinking it may help you on your journey down the road with a beautiful-looking hair.

string.name: c0
string.value: Wow, the owner is still the best of the best at this!

string.name: c1
string.value: Please don't just leave...check out the hairstyles available for a change...

string.name: n0
string.value: Welcome to Orbis Skin-Care~!

string.name: n1
string.value: So you want the most popular skin color these days, right?

string.name: s0
string.value: What's the popular skin-color at Victoria Island?

string.name: s1
string.value: It's good to look healthy with a nicely-tanned skin

string.name: name
string.value: Riza the Assistant

string.name: n0
string.value: You...look like someone that may need a plastic surgery.

string.name: n1
string.value: How about completely redoing your face with the most popular look these days?

string.name: name
string.value: Elma the Housekeeper

string.name: n0
string.value: Where did my master go...sigh...

string.name: n1
string.value: What's going to happen to my next paycheck if the master isn't coming back...

string.name: name
string.value: Kriel the Fairy

string.name: n0
string.value: Humans are just so shameless these days...they ask for favors as if it's nothing.

string.name: n1
string.value: Wow...I definitely need a hand here. I better be working hard.

string.name: n0
string.value: Where did Hella go...?

string.name: n1
string.value: I'm worried that monsters these days are much more ferocious...

string.name: name
string.value: Ticketing Usher

string.name: n0
string.value: We hope you enjoy your trip!

string.name: n1
string.value: There's a set capacity for this trip, so please hurry! It's ready for takeoff really soon!

string.name: n2
string.value: Be aware that if you enter the cash shop while onboard, you'll be sent back to Orbis.

string.name: name
string.value: Orbis Magic Spot

string.name: name
string.value: El Nath Magic Spot

string.name: n0
string.value: Please purchase ticket from me and get on the board.

string.name: n1
string.value: We sincerely hope you enjoy your trip!

string.name: n0
string.value: If you have a set of raw ores of a mineral or a jewel, you should let me take care of the rest...

string.name: n1
string.value: I've been handling various ores for decades now...so long, that I can refine them with my eyes closed...

string.name: n0
string.value: You won't find these weapons anywhere else...haha

string.name: n1
string.value: Our weapon store only deals with the finest weapons around...

string.name: n0
string.value: Hey, there! Your shoes look worn out...how about trying on MY pair of shoes?

string.name: n1
string.value: I have been making shoes in this town for over 50 years now...hahah

string.name: name
string.value: Master Sergent Fox

string.name: n0
string.value: Arrgh...WHERE DID MY MEN GO?!?!

string.name: n1
string.value: I need to find them fast...hey you! Can you help me out here?

string.name: name
string.value: Mr. Mohammed

string.name: n0
string.value: You need a place to store your items and mesos? Then you came to the right place.

string.name: n1
string.value: My storage is safe and secure, so no worries!

string.name: n0
string.value: Hmmm...another new set of datas...the more I work on it, the more it seems to never end...

string.name: n1
string.value: I found something very interesting, but it's not something I can work on just by myself...

string.name: n0
string.value: An old friend of mine is suddenly nowhere to be found...I wonder how she's doing these days...

string.name: n1
string.value: I've been investigating around this town lately and found some very interesting facts in the process...

string.name: n0
string.value: Hey, back in the day, I could have taken down some Yeti's if I felt like it...

string.name: n1
string.value: The hunting hasn't been easy these days...those monsters out there got pretty ferocious...

string.name: n0
string.value: Do you want to be a more powerful warrior than you ever were?

string.name: n1
string.value: This is a sacred ground, so please try to stay calm.

string.name: n0
string.value: You'll need to see me in order to become the best magician in the world.

string.name: n1
string.value: Can anyone pass my test ...?

string.name: n0
string.value: The path of the bowman is long and treacherous.

string.name: n1
string.value: Please be quiet so we can concentrate on our work here.

string.name: n0
string.value: You want to become a powerful thief? Then you've come to the right person.

string.name: n1
string.value: Please try not to make any noise around here.

string.name: n0
string.value: I personally welcome you to El Nath...and for that, how about taking a look at some nice armors around here?

string.name: n1
string.value: Without armors, you may run into some trouble against the monsters...so take a look around them and see if you like any one of them.

string.name: n0
string.value: Hello I'm Hana, the master alchemist in this town. Go take a look around and see if you find anything you like.

string.name: n1
string.value: Welcome~! Whatever you may need for your journey, I have them all.

string.name: n0
string.value: Don't even think about entering here...it's not some place where anyone can just waltz in...

string.name: n1
string.value: Only the strongest can enter here...if you want in, talk to me

string.name: name
string.value: Sergeant Bravo

string.name: n0
string.value: Where is this? Where's Master Sergeant Fox?

string.name: n1
string.value: Ahh...it's cold here...but I can't be stopped!!

string.name: name
string.value: Corporal Easy

string.name: n0
string.value: Where did the Sergeant and Staff Sergeant go???

string.name: n1
string.value: Eh...?? I don't think this is where I was supposed to land...

string.name: name
string.value: Rock Covered in Snow

string.name: name
string.value: Small Tomb

string.name: name
string.value: Holy Stone

string.name: name
string.value: Piece of Statue

string.name: n0
string.value: This used to be a peaceful town ... until one day, monsters started popping out of everywhere.

string.name: n1
string.value: In the deepest part of the Zakum Dungeon rest the strongest of the foes.

string.name: n2
string.value: Does anyone want to try the Zakum Quest?

string.name: n0
string.value: Welcome to the retreat.

string.name: n1
string.value: I have various items here for you. Go take a look.

string.name: n2
string.value: The items may not be upto par with the town, but feel free to look around.

string.name: n0
string.value: Talk to me if you want to drop out any time.

string.name: n1
string.value: It won't get any easier as you move on...

string.name: n0
string.value: The only way out is to talk to me.

string.name: n1
string.value: If you want out, then talk to me.

string.name: n0
string.value: I've been in here for 30 years now...

string.name: n1
string.value: I'm working on gathering up the materials for some spells.

string.name: n0
string.value: Spiruna tend to get overly aggressive at times...but once you get to know her, she is really a nice person at heart.

string.name: n1
string.value: I've been assisting Spiruna while working hard myself, but it hasn't been easy...

string.name: n0
string.value: I'm working on an important magic, so please don't bother me.

string.name: n1
string.value: Kids these days...they just barge into someone else's home as if it's nothing...

string.name: n0
string.value: Please gather up the ore of fire and the paper document. The more documents you have, the better it is.

string.name: n1
string.value: You'll need a special item to go into the inner part of Zakum.

string.name: n0
string.value: Apparently there is an unfathomably powerful monster inside Zakum.

string.name: n1
string.value: Wow, you definitely worked your way up here.

string.name: name
string.value: Ticketing Usher

string.name: n0
string.value: You'll need to purchase the ticket in order to get on board to go to Orbis.

string.name: n1
string.value: If you want to check out the schedule, then talk to me.

string.name: name
string.value: Toy Soldier

string.name: n0
string.value: I can't let anyone and everyone in.

string.name: n1
string.value: It's my job to protect this place.

string.name: name
string.value: Toy Soldier

string.name: n0
string.value: You'll need to find the ones that are different in shapes.

string.name: n1
string.value: This room is not available for the public.

string.name: name
string.value: Cheng the Intern

string.name: n0
string.value: This castle possesses many hidden towers.

string.name: n1
string.value: Please try to be quiet once inside.

string.name: name
string.value: Roly-Poly 1

string.name: n0
string.value: Ludibrium is SO enormous, I can't ever take a day off here.

string.name: n1
string.value: There are so many places that need some fixing.

string.name: name
string.value: Roly-Poly 2

string.name: n0
string.value: Sigh ... hopefully I get done with work soon.

string.name: n1
string.value: I fix and fix and fix and still, the work never ends.

string.name: name
string.value: Roly-Poly 3

string.name: n0
string.value: I'm in charge of fixing things here.

string.name: n1
string.value: It's dangerous around here, so stay away from me!

string.name: name
string.value: Roly-Poly 4

string.name: n0
string.value: Fixing is hard, but it is worth doing.

string.name: n1
string.value: I'm sure other workers are also working hard, right?

string.name: name
string.value: Roly-Poly 5

string.name: n0
string.value: Hey! It's dangerous around there!

string.name: n1
string.value: This is nothing compared to the days of making the towers ourselves.

string.name: name
string.value: Roly-Poly 6

string.name: n0
string.value: I've always longed to work at a huge tower like this.

string.name: n1
string.value: If you find any spot that needs some fixing, then let me know, okay?

string.name: name
string.value: Roly-Poly 7

string.name: n0
string.value: My eyes? It's just an eye disease.

string.name: n1
string.value: It would be awesome if my daily commute isn't so long.

string.name: name
string.value: Roly-Poly 8

string.name: n0
string.value: Oh my gosh, I'm tired. I think I'll rest for a second.

string.name: n1
string.value: I forgot to eat breakfast, so I'm hungry like no other right now.

string.name: n0
string.value: I'm sure these potions will help you on your future ... I've tried them all!

string.name: n1
string.value: Our potions here are unlike anything else in the world.

string.name: name
string.value: Roly-Poly 9

string.name: n0
string.value: I may be the youngest worker around, but I work my butt off everyday!

string.name: n1
string.value: Oh, that place has been fixed, so it's fine.

string.name: name
string.value: Roly-Poly 10

string.name: n0
string.value: Am I working hard? Can't you tell just from looking?

string.name: n1
string.value: I want to get this done with and go home...!!

string.name: n0
string.value: If you want to know anything about minigames, then talk to me.

string.name: n1
string.value: You may try hard, but you'll never, ever beat me.

string.name: name
string.value: Kaho the Plant Manager

string.name: n0
string.value: Those workers ... are they working hard even when I'm not around?

string.name: n1
string.value: Oh no, I forgot to bring my lunchbox to work today...

string.name: n2
string.value: I'm Kaho the plant manager for this place. There are many dangerous machines around, so please be careful.

string.name: n0
string.value: Don't you want to make something? It's a piece of cake for me~

string.name: n1
string.value: Hmmm ... you can gather up some really fine materials here at Ludibrium.

string.name: name
string.value: Green Mesoranger

string.name: n0
string.value: As long as we're here, everything will be fine!

string.name: n1
string.value: Did we ... miss our takeoff?

string.name: name
string.value: Black Mesoranger

string.name: n0
string.value: Pink Mesoranger is ALWAYS late ... we can't be at our 100% strength unless all 5 of us are here.

string.name: n1
string.value: Nothing scares us when all 5 of us are here!

string.name: n0
string.value: Welcome to our hospital! Your face looks terrrrrible. Need my help?

string.name: n1
string.value: Every once in a while comes a person whose face is a little hard to touch. You happen to be that person, haha... how do you want it?

string.name: name
string.value: Ticketing Usher

string.name: n0
string.value: If you want to get on board to the ship that heads to Orbis, then please hand me the ticket.

string.name: n1
string.value: There's a limited capacity on this trip, so please get on board now! We're about to take off!

string.name: n2
string.value: Please be aware that if you go into the Cash Shop while on board, you'll be sent back to Ludibrium.

string.name: name
string.value: Erin the Crewmember

string.name: n0
string.value: Can I help you with anything? Enjoy your trip~

string.name: n1
string.value: Anyone that wants to leave the ship and head back to the original spot, talk to me.

string.name: n2
string.value: Please be aware that if you go into the Cash Shop while on board, you'll be sent back to where you were before.

string.name: n0
string.value: There are places in Ludibrium where the monsters pop out of nowhere.

string.name: n1
string.value: We have a weapon JUST FOR YOU!

string.name: n0
string.value: Welcome! Look around, see what you like.

string.name: n1
string.value: A tough armor is necessary, for the monsters may pop up anywhere inside the castle.

string.name: n0
string.value: Make sure you don't get lost inside the castle.

string.name: n1
string.value: Welcome to Ludibrium!

string.name: n0
string.value: Hey, beta tester!! How's it going??

string.name: n1
string.value: Isn't it beautiful today? I would like nothing more than just go somewhere...

string.name: n0
string.value: We sell stuff that you can't find anywhere else!

string.name: n1
string.value: Need potions or some food? You've come to the right place.

string.name: a0
string.value: You!! You aren't jacking anything from here, right?

string.name: a1
string.value: Touch anything here, and I'll be very very angry with you!

string.name: g0
string.value: It's tougher than you think, making new potions

string.name: g1
string.value: Hah! Just making new potions here ...

string.name: n0
string.value: Oh my, you still have that hairdo? That's sooo yesterday ...

string.name: n1
string.value: If you want to try a different hair style, then just talk to me!

string.name: name
string.value: Storage Guard Sepi

string.name: n0
string.value: Looking for a place to store your mesos or items? Then look no further!

string.name: n1
string.value: Our storage is safe as a lock, so feel free to leave your stuff here!

string.name: n0
string.value: Welcome to our hair salon! I may be still in training, but how about letting me do your hair?

string.name: n1
string.value: It's a tough act being a hair stylist...

string.name: n0
string.value: Wanna change your face into something ... much more beautiful?

string.name: n1
string.value: You look fine now, but with a little touch here and there, you'll look FANTABULOUS

string.name: name
string.value: Yellow Mesoranger

string.name: n0
string.value: Worried about monsters? Let us handle them!

string.name: n1
string.value: It's our job to protect everyone here!

string.name: name
string.value: Pink Mesoranger

string.name: n0
string.value: It's so hard to wake up early each morning. I should stop being late ...

string.name: n1
string.value: I'm more than happy to protect you all, except for the fact that I sleep waaay too much...

string.name: n0
string.value: Where's my brother...?

string.name: n1
string.value: I need to get to where the event takes place...

string.name: n0
string.value: Where's my lil bro...?

string.name: n1
string.value: I need to get to where the event takes place...

string.name: n0
string.value: Come talk to me, if you're one of those that won the prizes.

string.name: n0
string.value: We're the descendants of Viking, the king of the sea.

string.name: n0
string.value: We're the descendants of Viking, the king of the sea.

string.name: n0
string.value: We're the descendants of Viking, the king of the sea.

string.name: n0
string.value: We're the descendants of Viking, the king of the sea.

string.name: name
string.value: Chun Ji

string.name: n0
string.value: Don't talk to me...

string.name: n1
string.value: Leave now...before you get hurt

string.name: n2
string.value: Are you telling me I'm worse than Man Ji??

string.name: name
string.value: Mr. Pickall

string.name: n0
string.value: There is no lock in the world that I can't pick...!

string.name: n0
string.value: We're the descendants of Viking, the king of the sea.

string.name: n0
string.value: Click me and you'll go back to where you were.

string.name: n1
string.value: Come back for another event.

string.name: n0
string.value: The event starts any minute ...

string.name: n1
string.value: The bros aren't ... coming ...

string.name: n0
string.value: There are coconuts that drop, and the ones that don't.

string.name: n1
string.value: Please make sure you don't use up all your stamina.

string.name: n2
string.value: Wanna know how to play this?

string.name: n3
string.value: Need weapons? I'm offering a beginner's bat for 1 meso.

string.name: n0
string.value: Where are my bros?

string.name: n1
string.value: I should get to where the event is ...

string.name: n0
string.value: If you have the Scroll of Evil, how about letting me handle it?

string.name: name
string.value: Maple Administrator

string.name: n0
string.value: Hello, all

string.name: n1
string.value: To play the game the right way, we strongly suggest you don't use hacking tools to ruin it for others.

string.name: n0
string.value: Hey all!

string.name: n1
string.value: Hope you all have a wonderful day today

string.name: n0
string.value: Hey all!

string.name: n1
string.value: Hope you all have a wonderful day today

string.name: n0
string.value: Hey all!

string.name: n1
string.value: Hope you all have a wonderful day today

string.name: n0
string.value: Do you want to combine powers of your party members to solve this quest?

string.name: n1
string.value: There are lots of obstacles here where the only way you'll pass is by joining forces with your party members.

string.name: n0
string.value: You need to answer my question in order to move on to the next level.

string.name: n1
string.value: The difficulty of this problem depends on how you relate to one another.

string.name: n0
string.value: If you want to leave this place, come talk to me.

string.name: n1
string.value: You can always get out of here through me.

string.value: I may look like this, but I'm a peaceful person...BELIEVE IT!

string.value: Raimu the Warrior

string.name: n0
string.value: This is a Mushroom Shrine

string.name: n2
string.value: I may be a wanderer, but I am a man of integrity, so trust me.

string.value: Kino Konoko

string.name: n0
string.value: Cleaning isn't fun...

string.name: n1
string.value: The Mushroom Shrine is always in spring...

string.name: n2
string.value: Musssshhhhroooom Shrine~~~

string.name: n0
string.value: Sorry...the tempura is still cooking

string.name: n1
string.value: Who's winning the baseball game right now?

string.name: n2
string.value: Rest up buddy!

string.name: n1
string.value: If I don't create a new menu...

string.name: n2
string.value: Hold on one sec. I'm making Dango...

string.name: n0
string.value: Hold on hold on...takoyaki isn't made in an instant!

string.name: n1
string.value: Huh? I have something stuck on my teeth?

string.name: n2
string.value: If you don't rest up well, your skin may go bad...

string.name: name
string.value: Jin Jia

string.name: n0
string.value: Please hold on one second. It's not done yet.

string.name: n1
string.value: Phew...I should rest up a bit.

string.name: n2
string.value: Hahaha...the sauce is the reason for this awesome taste.

string.name: n0
string.value: OK, weeelcoooome!

string.name: n1
string.value: The combination of the noodles and the seasoning...it's the bomb!

string.name: n2
string.value: No substitutions. Sorry.

string.value: Mushroom Statue

string.name: n0
string.value: If you want to make the job adv. as the GM, come talk to me.

string.name: n0
string.value: You'll be able to level up if you're here with the GM

string.name: n0
string.value: It is easy to make gloves~

string.name: n1
string.value: I have a special glove for you... You want to take a look?

string.name: n0
string.value: People are looking for my shoes in these days.

string.name: n1
string.value: Have you ever heard about stimulator? With this... haha... yeah...

string.name: n0
string.value: Do you want to make a weapon? This is the perfect place.

string.name: n1
string.value: You need to have manuals to make weapons

string.name: name
string.value: Lost Guard

string.name: n0
string.value: Can anyone help me?

string.name: n1
string.value: Where am I...?

string.name: name
string.value: First Eos Rock

string.name: name
string.value: Second Eos Rock

string.name: name
string.value: Third Eos Rock

string.name: name
string.value: Fourth Eos Rock

string.name: n0
string.value: You want to have a slim & sexy body like me? I will make your skin beautiful~

string.name: n1
string.value: Wow... you must be traveling all around... your skin got damaged a lot...

string.name: n0
string.value: Are you looking for the pet food?

string.name: n1
string.value: Aren't your pets hungry? I got some food for them~

string.name: n0
string.value: I have lots of weapons for you. Pick one~

string.name: n1
string.value: It is so hard to find the materials for the weapon in these days. There are just too many monsters.

string.name: name
string.value: Dr. Kim

string.name: n0
string.value: We need to get going soon, but where is everyone?

string.name: n1
string.value: hmm... You guys are not strong enough to fight against aliens, yet...

string.name: name
string.value: Alien Gray

string.name: n0
string.value: My name is Gray from the space...

string.name: n1
string.value: I want to be a friend with you

string.name: n0
string.value: We have lots of excellent armors in Omega Sceptor

string.name: n1
string.value: You must have good armors to fight against aliens

string.name: name
string.value: Storage Guard Gubo

string.name: n0
string.value: Are you looking for the storage place?

string.name: n1
string.value: My storage is totally safe~! I guarantee you...

string.name: n0
string.value: Tsk, Tsk... I'll be late if I don't get going!

string.name: n1
string.value: As long as I am here, this place is safe!!!

string.name: n0
string.value: Where is Mirol?...

string.name: n1
string.value: I'm getting tired of going on missions every day.

string.name: n0
string.value: Hoon is always whining

string.name: n1
string.value: We need to have female pilots

string.name: n0
string.value: I hope these potions can help you out here

string.name: n1
string.value: My potion is excellent! Completely different from other potions~!

string.name: n0
string.value: There is an event for New Castle Ludibrium~

string.name: n1
string.value: Join the Ludibrium opening sweepstakes~ we're giving away tons of prizes!

string.name: n0
string.value: Hey, care to help me out??

string.name: n1
string.value: I'm telling you, I really AM from WIZET!
